dcterms:description: The MNIST dataset is a collection of handwritten digits used for training various image processing systems. It consists of 60,000 training images and 10,000 testing images, each of size 28x28 pixels.
dcterms:title: MNIST

dcterms:creator: Pablo Arbelez
Michael Maire
Charless Fowlkes
Jitendra Malik
dcterms:description: The BSDS500 dataset is used for evaluating contour detection and image segmentation algorithms. It contains 500 images with ground truth annotations for contours and segmentations.
dcterms:title: BSDS500
